Oct. 17, 1982 D Manchester District Contest (Fourth Section)
Manchester District Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Manchester District Contest manchester-district-contest-fourth-section
Test Piece Contest
Fancy Free
Radisson Blu Edwardian Manchester Hotel, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Best euphonium - Stephen Boot (Boarshurst 'B') Prizes - 1st £100 and shield, 2nd £50 and cup, 3rd £25 and cup. 11 bands competed.
Dec. 12, 2014, 12:40 a.m. Jan. 12, 2015, 10:34 a.m.
